name: Alert Trip Mines
description: This portable tripwire mine releases firecrackers and a small flare, alerting others to its location. Comes in a pack of four.

name: Concertina Trip Mines
description: This portable tripwire mine deploys a small concertina bundle perfect for blocking doors and windows. Comes in a pack of two.

name: Poison Trip Mines
description: This portable tripwire mine releases a cloud of poison when triggered, disorienting enemies. Comes in a pack of two.

name: Choke Bomb
description: The Choke Bomb exudes a gas that extinguishes any flames within its radius while active- as well as preventing new fires from being lit- and induces heavy coughing. Comes in a pack of two.

name: Decoy Fuses
description: A pack of decoy fuses that imitate the behavior of a lit bomb - and can fool your enemies into clearing a space. Can ignite flammable materials.

name: Decoys
description: A bag of scrap metal and glass. When thrown the noise can be effectively used to distract or divert enemies.

name: Blank Fire Decoys
description: A decoy that imitates the sound of a gunshot impact. Useful to distract and confuse enemies.

name: Dusters
description: A row of metal rings worn on the hand in order to increase the damage caused in hand-to-hand combat.

name: Knuckle Knife
description: The savage knuckle knife is a roughshod specialization for close quarters combat, suited for both bludgeoning and brutal thrusting deathblows.

name: Knife
description: An all-purpose tool and melee weapon that has saved many lives - and taken just as many.

name: Heavy Knife
description: The heavy knife is honed for close quarters combat, its iconic silhouette carves out its home in the American pantheon of armaments.

name: Throwing Knives
description: Silent, but short-ranged projectile weapon. Thrown knives can be retrieved and re-used.

name: Throwing Axes
description: Silent and deadly short-ranged projectile weapon. Can be retrieved and reused.

name: Electric Lamp
description: A battery-powered light worn on the shoulder. Increases visibility and can be used to blind nearby enemies during night.

name: Fusees
description: A pack of three handheld railroad flares used for illuminating dark areas and for signalling. Can ignite flammable materials.

name: Flare Pistol
description: A small pistol for firing flares into the air, illuminating the area. Can ignite flammable materials.

name: First Aid Kit
description: A bag of medical supplies that heal 50 health and stop bleeding. Can be used three times.

name: Quad Derringer
description: A small, light pistol that is easy to carry and conceal. Holds four shots. Twelve additional rounds carried.

name: Spyglass
description: A monocular optical instrument for seeing things far away as if they were nearby.
